label: Candidate Library
description: Build a customized compound library of 30+ candidates based on biological intent and selected sources.

defaultInputs.name: Search Keyword
defaultInputs.tooltip: Short text that anchors the search (e.g. "natural flavonoids", "peptides").

defaultInputs.name: Target Protein(s)
defaultInputs.tooltip: Optional list of protein targets to focus the search (e.g. GSK3B, PDE1A).

defaultInputs.name: Scientific Description
defaultInputs.tooltip: Free‑text background or hypotheses the library should reflect.

defaultOutputs.name: Vecurate Link
defaultOutputs.tooltip: URL link to the compound entry in the Vecurate database

defaultOutputs.name: EU CoSing
defaultOutputs.tooltip: URL link to the compound entry in the EU CosIng database for cosmetic ingredient regulation

defaultOutputs.name: SMILES
defaultOutputs.tooltip: SMILES string representing the compound's chemical structure.

configSchema.label: Primary Sources
configSchema.tooltip: Choose one or more databases to pull candidate structures from.

configSchema.label: Or upload Compound List
configSchema.tooltip: Upload your own compound list; parsed names/SMILES will be merged into the library.
